name: Doomed Survivors
description:
Night has come and the Zombies have risen. You are apart of the Doomed Survivors who have only one choice, kill the Zombie hordes before they kill you. Level up your characters, gain abilities, and survive until daybreak.

Features

  • The Nerd: This starter character comes with a Pistol and a Drone with an attached gun that follows you and shoots Zombies.
  • The Prepper: This is the moment he's been waiting for. Tough as nails and comes with a shotgun with a wide spread.
  • The Mobster: He has an offer you can't refuse and that offer is an automatic machine gun that mows down Zombies with ease.
  • As you level up, choose from different abilities that create synergies that will benefit your build.
  • Unlock more skills unique to each character that will help you survive the night.
